name: Cave Collapse (onieth)
description:
This is my entry for the  February 1-4, 2019 – Palette Jam.

Please don't be too harsh with the critiques because this is my first game.

The only control is the space bar.

Hope you like it.

Credits:

  • Game Creator:Burak Dogucu
  • Sound Effects: me and https://opengameart.org/content/falling-rock
  • Music: https://opengameart.org/content/underground
